charges.charge_description: Did knowingly possess a firearm while a convicted felon in and affecting commerce. 18:922(g)(1) and 924(a)(2). Date of Offense: November 28, 2001. Penalty: Not more than 10 years imprisonment, a fine of $250,000, up to 3 years SRT, and a $100 special assessment.(1)

charges.charge_disposition: 40 months BOP, 3 yrs SRT, $100.00 Special Assessement

charges.charge_description: Did knowingly possess a firearm while a convicted felon in and affecting commerce. Date of Offense: On or about November 28, 2001. Penalty: Not more than 10 years imprisonment, a fine of $250,000, up to 3 years SRT, and a $100 special assessment.(2)

charges.charge_disposition: 21 months BOP, 3 yrs SRT, $100.00 Special Assessment

charges.charge_description: Did knowingly and intentionally possess with intent to distribute approximately 11 kilograms of marijuana. 21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(D). Date of Offense: November 28, 2001. Penalty: Not more than 5 years imprisonment, a fine of $250,000, at least 2 years SRT, and a $100 special assessment, and community restitution up to the amount of any fine imposed by the court.(3)
